description.oldValue:
Users can now create up to 1000 channels per
team, which allow you to have the channels you need organized in one team.
description.newValue: Users can now create up to 1000 channels per team, which allow you to have the channels you need organized in one team. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
